• Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game built with HTML5, JavaScript, and MQTT for real-time networking.
  • Features include procedurally generated maps, mining mechanics, vehicle upgrades, shop system, and admin controls.
  • Players can explore, mine resources, build structures, trade with others, and save/load game progress using IndexedDB.
  • The game includes a dynamic day/night cycle, weather effects, and a minimap for navigation.

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game where players explore procedurally generated worlds, mine resources, build structures, and trade with others. The game features real-time networking via MQTT, vehicle upgrades, a shop system, and admin controls. Players can save their progress locally and sync maps with other players in the same room.
